leaders.bg: Co-founded Direct Funding Now in 2015 with Christian Murillo in Irvine, CA. Five-time Inc. 5000 honoree since 2020. Has funded over $750M to small businesses nationwide. Also founded Kudo Funding in 2023, expanding his alternative finance portfolio with cutting-edge technology and ISO partnerships.

CRO at Direct Funding Now driving revenue strategy. Previously Chief Sales Officer at US Business Funding where he exceeded $20M/month in funding volume. Before that served as VP Finance at Complete Funding Financial Services. Based in Orange, CA with expertise in building high-performing sales teams.
Chief Operating Officer at Direct Funding Now based in Irvine, CA. Oversees daily operations and financial services delivery for the 74-person team across the marketplace platform.

news.h: Direct Funding Now Named 2025 Inc. 5000 Honoree
news.d: Direct Funding Now earned its fifth consecutive Inc. 5000 recognition with $8.2M in reported revenue.

news.h: Kenneth Manesse Launches Kudo Funding
news.d: Founder expanded his portfolio with a new lending brand, Kudo Funding, targeting additional market segments.

name: Duke & Co, LLC d/b/a Dynamic Capital

leaders.bg: Co-founded Dynamic Capital in 2016 in Miami/Fort Lauderdale area. Hosts 'The Steven Edisis Show' discussing business finance topics. Active thought leader on LinkedIn advocating for better alternatives to traditional MCA. Management team includes CFO Gregg Mora and account executives. Company generates $7.9M annual revenue.

name: NATIONAL BIZ LLC d/b/a National Business Capital

leaders.bg: Founded National Business Capital in 2007 from a spare bedroom on Long Island, grew it to $2B+ in total financing secured without any private equity investment. Named CEO in 2020. Hosts 'The Fund Tank' show airing Fridays at 9am ET where entrepreneurs pitch growth plans. Forbes Finance Council member. Active YouTube creator showcasing strategic deals including a $5M sub-debt client deal.

Promoted to COO after 7+ years as VP of Financing at National Business Capital. Completed MIT Sloan Applied Business Analytics executive program. Oversees funding operations, tech infrastructure, and data intelligence. Analytical skills and cross-department collaboration have driven rapid company growth.
CFO at National Business Capital with CPA and CGMA certifications. Specializes in data-driven financial strategies and operational excellence for privately held companies.

news.h: Joe Camberato Launches Fund Tank Show
news.d: Weekly show where entrepreneurs pitch growth plans and receive strategic financing advice from the NBC team.

news.h: National Business Capital Surpasses $2B in Total Financing
news.d: The Long Island-based fintech marketplace has now secured over $2 billion in financing for entrepreneurs since 2007.

leaders.bg: Founded Premium Merchant Funding in 2014 in NYC. Holds a Bachelor's in Political Science/French from Purchase College, SUNY (2012-2014). Previously at Chaves & Perlowitz, LLP. Now serves as Funder at the 236-employee company with 22 offices globally, generating $58.6M in annual revenue.

COO at Premium Merchant Funding working closely with CEO Sam Lallouz on company culture. Holds a JD in Law from Fordham University (2011-2015). 14+ years of customer service experience. Co-cultivated company culture from inception alongside leadership team.

news.h: PMF Facilitates $3.3M Construction Loan in Sarasota
news.d: Premium Merchant Funding successfully cross-sold a tailored real estate construction loan with 80% LTC for a luxury spec home project, closed in two weeks.

news.h: 60 Guilders & PMF Acquire 292 Madison Avenue for $90.5M
news.d: 60 Guilders Alt Equity Group and Premium Merchant Funding acquired 204,200 sq ft office space from Vanbarton Group.

news.h: PMF Assists NC Restaurant Owner with MCA Resolution
news.d: Guided a small business owner through returning unauthorized MCA and arranging a $100K loan with credit repair assistance.

name: RIVERPOINT FINANCIAL GROUP INC. d/b/a Redwood Capital Solutions d/b/a Express Capital Group

leaders.bg: President of Riverpoint Capital since founding. Family-run business with Sruli Anatian (CEO) and Esther Anatian (COO). Based in Hollywood, FL with a second office in New York. Over a decade of experience providing short-term business loans, bridge financing, lines of credit, and equipment financing.

Co-Chief Executive Officer at Shore Funding Solutions since founding in 2014. Based in Melville, NY. Has grown the company to facilitate over $1 billion in funding with 80+ professionals. Achieved Inc. 5000 ranking at #4162 in 2025. Maintains 100% CEO approval rating on Glassdoor.

President overseeing Shore Funding Solutions' operations and strategic direction from Melville, NY headquarters. Part of the family leadership team that built Shore into a billion-dollar funding platform.

news.h: Shore Funding Solutions Named 2025 Inc. 5000 Company
news.d: Ranked #4162 on the 2025 Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing private companies in America.

news.h: Mike Hernandez Promoted to CTO
news.d: Former Director of IT promoted to Chief Technology Officer, signaling increased investment in technology infrastructure.

news.h: Shore Funding Registered in Virginia
news.d: Shore Funding Solutions Inc. registered as a sales-based financing provider with the Virginia State Corporation Commission.

leaders.bg: Owner and CEO of Signet Capital Group leading business funding operations across merchant cash advances, term loans, and revenue-based financing from Fort Lauderdale, FL. Company registered as sales-based financing provider in Virginia as of February 2026.
Director at Signet Capital Group overseeing company strategy and operations in the small business financing space. Part of family-run leadership structure.

Sky Bridge Business Funding was acquired by fintech company Revenued in July 2020 and rebranded as Horizon Business Funding. Revenued was founded in 2018 and has provided over $684M in financing to 18,000+ businesses. During 2020-2021, Horizon helped provide over $4B in PPP funding to 110K+ businesses.

Leads Acclivity Financial as a top SBA lender in the nation, a subsidiary of Citizens Bank. Previously SVP at Fidelity Bank responsible for the SBA division. Initiated and developed SBA groups for multiple banks including Fidelity, Main Street Bank, and Synovus. Team boasts 500+ years of combined SBA lending experience.
Oversees 12 lenders with over 265 collective years of SBA experience at Acclivity Financial. 21+ years in banking with prior experience at Fidelity Bank.
Over 40 years of commercial banking experience with 18 years specific to SBA programs. Leads business development efforts for Acclivity's government-guaranteed lending programs.

Founded Amerisource in 1984 with a $10,000 loan from his parents, growing it into one of the largest independent finance companies in Texas. Texas A&M BBA graduate (1982). Has provided over $2.1 billion in loans to companies across the US. Celebrated 40th anniversary in 2024. Special interest in assisting entrepreneurs.

Managing Partner since 1998 with 25+ years covering all aspects of commercial finance. 2018 President of the Commercial Finance Association. Prior career at Team Bank, Bank One (predecessors to JPMorgan Chase), and Riviera Finance. Extensive experience in credit, underwriting, compliance, and portfolio risk management.

Limited public info connecting Kelly Merryman Hoogstraten to Amerisource. Kelly Merryman Hoogstraten is publicly known as former VP Content Partnerships at YouTube (7 years) and prior VP Content Acquisition at Netflix. Currently CEO of Wonder Project and COO of Aura. If serving as CEO of Amerisource, this represents a major media-to-finance crossover.

news.h: Amerisource Closes $30M ABL Facility for Infrastructure Co.
news.d: Closed a $30M asset-based lending facility to a Southwest-based midstream energy infrastructure company.

news.h: Amerisource Provides $2.5M ABL to Texas Distributor
news.d: Provided a $2.5M asset-based lending facility to support growth of a Texas-based industrial supplies distributor.

news.h: Amerisource Closes $3M Working Capital for Transport Co.
news.d: Closed a $3M working capital facility for a North Dakota transportation company after prior lender imposed restrictions.

leaders.bg: Founded Bluegrass Lending in June 2020 and grew it to over $350M in funded volume. University of Kentucky BBA graduate (2015-2018). Offices in Louisville KY, Tempe AZ, and New York NY. Company offers MCA, SBA, lines of credit and other financing with 24-48 hour funding.

Founded C6 Capital Holdings in April 2019. Career spans Morgan Stanley Investment Management (portfolio manager, 8-person team), South Ferry Capital Management, Candlewood Investment Group, and Bloomberg (Energy Industry Analyst 2017-2019). Syracuse University MBA, Loyola Maryland BA. Built a $12M HoldCo through two acquisitions. C6 deploys AI algorithms to structure unstructured data across filings.

news.h: Mark Rossano Discusses Building $12M HoldCo
news.d: Featured interview discussing journey from Morgan Stanley and global oil trading to building a holding company owning hydroelectric plants and sustainable fertilizer companies.

leaders.bg: Vanderbilt University BA in Corporate Finance (2013). Founded CapFront in 2017 after working as senior funding manager and director of business development at Imperial Advance (now Funderial). Inspired by his 3rd-generation family retail business's struggle to secure traditional bank financing. Accepted into Forbes Business Council in September 2022. CapFront operates in USA, Canada, and Australia.

Co-founded CapFront in 2017 with Zack Fiddle. LIU graduate with Bachelor's in Finance and Accounting. Previously at Imperial Advance (now Funderial). Serves as COO overseeing sales operations in the small business funding market.

Founded Creative Capital Solutions in 2019 in NYC and grew it from 5 employees to 75+ professionals, funding over $1 billion to SMBs. Investment banking background with experience at BizFi Solution and prior roles in retail operations (Name Brand Overstock, Global Discount). Serves 10,000+ business clients with working capital advances, lines of credit, and asset-based loans.

Founded Ein Cap Inc. in Brooklyn, NY to provide merchant cash advances to small businesses across America through ISO partnerships. Also based in Miami, FL. Works in Venture Capital and Private Equity space. Specializes in funding even up to 4th position deals for businesses needing quick capital access.
CEO of Ein Cap managing the company's MCA operations and ISO network relationships. Based in Brooklyn, NY.

CEO of Envision Capital Group since founding in 2007 in Laguna Hills, CA. Also owner/president/CEO of Maximum Merchant Processing DBA MLS Direct Network Inc. since 2005. Has helped thousands of companies secure equipment financing. A+ BBB accreditation. Multiple Inc. 5000 recognitions from 2013-2016.
Chief Operating Officer overseeing Envision's equipment leasing and vendor financing operations including the Vendor 360 Program.

Named President of Financial Pacific Leasing on July 1, 2025. Joined FinPac in 2015 as VP of Vendor Finance and worked his way up. Oversees the company's 40,000+ customer portfolio and $1.7B in assets. FinPac is a subsidiary of Columbia Banking System.

SVP and Chief Credit Officer at Financial Pacific Leasing since January 2015. Responsible for all aspects of credit risk management including credit policy, underwriting, and scorecard management. Chairs the risk management committee. Previously spent 7 years as Director of Credit at CIT Equipment Finance.
Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer at Financial Pacific Leasing. With FinPac since 1998, rose through the ranks over 25+ years.

news.h: Allen Snelling Named President of Financial Pacific Leasing
news.d: Former VP of Vendor Finance promoted to president after a decade with the Columbia Bank subsidiary.

news.h: FinPac Net Charge-Offs Surge on Transportation Pressures
news.d: Q4 net charge-offs hit 5.39% of $1.7B portfolio, a 225bp YoY increase, isolated to trucking portfolio.

news.h: Columbia Banking Completes Pacific Premier Bancorp Acquisition
news.d: Parent company Columbia Banking System completed acquisition and plans to integrate systems in Q1 2026.

leaders.bg: JD Factors has been providing receivables factoring since 1989, headquartered in the Los Angeles area with offices throughout the US and Canada. Co-Presidents Bo Kelly and Matt Johnson lead the company. Premiere transportation factor in North America with 30+ years of experience. Did not increase rates to clients during 2025.

news.h: JD Factors Provides $350K Facility to Ontario Transport Co.
news.d: Part of a series of factoring deals including $750K in Alberta, $500K in Missouri, $250K in New Jersey, and facilities across multiple states and Canadian provinces.

news.h: JD Factors Celebrates 30 Years of Factoring in Canada
news.d: Milestone anniversary for the company's cross-border factoring operations serving the trucking and transportation industry.

leaders.bg: Co-founded LEAF in 2001 and served as President/COO before becoming CEO in April 2023. 40-year industry veteran. Now Chair of Equipment Leasing & Finance Foundation Board of Trustees (2026). Built LEAF into one of top 15 US equipment financiers with $1.7B+ annual originations. LEAF became M&T Bank subsidiary through 2022 acquisition.

Co-founded LEAF in 2001 with Miles Herman and served as CEO until 2023, then Chairman until retirement in 2024. Nearly 40-year industry veteran who built LEAF from an idea between two friends into a leading independent equipment finance brand. LEAF originated $1.7B+ annually before his retirement.

news.h: LEAF Issues $550M Asset-Backed Securities
news.d: LEAF Commercial Capital and M&T Equipment (2025-LEAF1) LLC issued $550M in asset-backed notes secured by leases and loan contracts.

news.h: Miles Herman Named ELFF Board Chair for 2026
news.d: LEAF CEO appointed Chair of the Equipment Leasing & Finance Foundation's Board of Trustees.

leaders.bg: Co-founded LendingPoint in 2014 and built it into an $8B+ funded AI-driven fintech. Previously served 13 years at CAN Capital, departing as COO. Company has raised $325M in total funding over 15 rounds. LendingPoint launched new passthrough securities program in August 2025 and announced strategic capital raise in November 2025 for 2026 growth.
hooks: *13 years at CAN Capital as COO

leaders.bg: Co-founded LendingPoint in 2014. Previously spent 13 years at CAN Capital as CTO. Over 20 years of executive experience at CAN Capital, First Data, and Western Union. Architected LendingPoint's 100% cloud-based loan processing platform using Cloud Lending Solutions.
Co-founded LendingPoint in 2014 alongside Tom Burnside, Franck Fatras, and Victor Pacheco. Leads strategic direction of the company. 15+ years as a private investor through Tavares PE Group.

news.h: LendingPoint Announces Strategic Capital Raise for 2026 Growth
news.d: Secured new capital from existing and new investors to scale technology, broaden products, expand partnerships, and accelerate hiring.

news.h: LendingPoint Launches Passthrough Securities Program
news.d: Launched new loan flow programs with first issuance of passthrough securities, expanding capital markets capabilities.

news.h: Mark Freeman Named CFO
news.d: New CFO stated 2026 will be a transformational year for the company's financial pathways and operational discipline.

leaders.bg: Promoted to CEO in January 2024 after 12 years as EVP. Previously at J.P. Morgan Real Estate Banking underwriting $1.6B in loan commitments. Led Maxim to 150% increase in Q1 2025 funding volume YoY, with 80% approval rate across 37 states. Grew team by 21% during 2025. Planning new credit guidelines for early 2026.

Founded Maxim Commercial Capital in 2008 during the financial crisis, building it into a national provider of $10K-$3M loans and leases. Now serves as Chairman. Also co-founded TAU Ventures. Company reported 25% growth in 2024.

news.h: Maxim Commercial Capital Grew Team by 21% During 2025
news.d: Expanded executive and operating teams as part of aggressive people-investment plan, deploying new credit guidelines in early 2026.

news.h: Maxim Reports 150% Q1 2025 Funding Volume Increase
news.d: Approved 80% of financing applications in Q1 2025 and funded borrowers in 37 states, a 150% YoY increase.

news.h: Maxim Reports 25% Growth in 2024
news.d: Strong annual results driven by truck, trailer, heavy equipment, and real estate lending nationwide.

leaders.bg: President and CEO of Merchant Source Inc since founding in 2008, based at 200 Garden City Plaza, Garden City, NY. Prior experience at Diamond Advances Inc, Lendr, Integrity First Mortgage, and Island Federal Mortgage. Offers customized MCA and business financing solutions up to $1M to small and medium-sized businesses.

Led Pathway Lending since May 2003, growing the balance sheet from $3M to $320M+. Presidential appointee to US Treasury CDFI Advisory Board and CFPB Consumer Advisory Board. Launched the Pathway Housing Fund with $30M in committed capital in December 2025 to preserve affordable housing in Tennessee. Organization has lent over $500M across Tennessee and Alabama.

news.h: Pathway Lending Launches $30M Affordable Housing Fund
news.d: Launched Pathway Housing Fund with $30M to acquire and preserve naturally occurring affordable housing in Tennessee communities at risk of gentrification.

news.h: Pathway Targets $12M Capital Injection in East Tennessee
news.d: Goal to inject $12M into East Tennessee communities in 2025 for small business growth, affordable housing, and sustainability.

news.h: Ascendus & Pathway Partner on Family Child Care Capital Access
news.d: CDFI partnership to strengthen small business owners through new loan products for licensed in-home child care providers.

leaders.bg: Founded Quick Capital Funding in 2014 in Irvine, CA. Built it into an A+ BBB-rated alternative finance marketplace using patented scoring technology. Offers MCA, term loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, and lines of credit from $5K to $5M across 725+ industries.

CEO of RidgeStone Capital since its 2020 incorporation in Irvine, CA. Company specializes in equipment financing, expansion capital, inventory funding, and working capital. Serves construction, medical, manufacturing, and franchise industries. Limited public information available about personal background.

Appointed CEO of Trio Capital in 2022. Spent 18 years at Marlin Capital Solutions where he led data science and analytics team, launched the working capital loan product, and served on the Senior Leadership Team and Risk Committee. Roles at Marlin included SVP Data Science, VP Risk Management, and Director of Risk Management. Cedarville University BA (Cum Laude) in Accounting/Finance, Rutgers MBA in Finance and Strategic Management.

Joined Trio Capital as President in 2023. Previously spent 21 years at Marlin Capital Solutions, most recently as Chief Sales Officer. Founded and headed Marlin's Healthcare Division. Over 30 years of equipment finance and small business lending experience.
Joined Trio Capital in November 2023 as VP of Sales to expand equipment financing distribution. Previously at Navitas Credit Corp. 20+ years of equipment finance experience.

news.h: Trio Capital Team Participates in 2025 NATDA Trailer Show
news.d: Trio Capital presence at the National Association of Trailer Dealers show in Nashville, expanding vendor-direct partnerships.

leaders.bg: Ace Partners (also Ace Funding) provides revenue-based funding solutions including MCA, lines of credit, and equipment financing to small businesses nationwide. Approves businesses for 100-150% of gross monthly income. Limited public information on specific leadership.

National Capital operates a business lending marketplace connecting SMBs to multiple lenders through a single application process with a 90% approval rate. Offers term loans, SBA loans, lines of credit, MCA, equipment financing, and invoice factoring. Limited public information on specific leadership.

Partner at Accord Business Funding. Previously named Houston Chairman of JP Morgan Chase in July 2004. Prior Bank One positions include Middle Market Southern Region Head (2003-2004) and Retail Southern Region Executive (2000-2003). Co-founded Accord in 2013 with nearly 5 decades of combined commercial funding experience.

CEO and co-founder of Accord Business Funding. One of two Texans with nearly 5 decades of combined commercial funding experience who founded Accord in Houston in 2013. Leads the ISO-driven MCA direct funder specializing in B-paper positions.

Serial entrepreneur since 1999 who founded ACA Financial LLC that year and One Park Financial in 2010 in Miami. Named Most Influential CEO 2023 - Florida by CEO-Monthly Magazine. Member of Orange Bowl Committee and 2026 Miami Host Committee for College Football Playoff Championship. Company named Sun Sentinel Top Workplace 8 times and Great Place to Work certified 8 consecutive years.

Chief Operations Officer of One Park Financial. Based in Frisco, Colorado. Oversees the company's lending partner network and operations connecting merchants with 20+ private business lenders across 48 states.

news.h: One Park Financial Named Sun Sentinel Top Workplace for 8th Time
news.d: Ranked 3rd out of 65 businesses with special award for Communication, marking eighth consecutive recognition.

news.h: One Park Financial Earns Great Place to Work for 8th Consecutive Year
news.d: Certified as Great Place to Work for the eighth time, demonstrating sustained employee satisfaction focus.

news.h: John Lie-Nielsen Named to 2026 CFP Championship Host Committee
news.d: CEO joins other South Florida leaders on the Miami Host Committee for the 2026 College Football Playoff National Championship.

leaders.bg: Founded Gibraltar Business Capital in 2010 via management buyout of Gibraltar Financial Corporation (est. 1951 in Chicago). Started career as account executive at GFC in 1995 and earned his way to operations leadership by 2005. Grew AUM by 300% and supported 300+ lower-middle-market clients. Active in Turnaround Management Association and Secured Finance Network. Board members named to 2026 TMA Executive Board.
hooks: *Led MBO from account exec to CEO

leaders.bg: Cap Fund provides merchant cash advances and working capital solutions to small businesses. Appears to be related to or share website with CapFront. Limited public information available on specific leadership or distinct operations.

Green Capital provides business cash advances with flexible repayment through daily ACH and split funding, serving small business owners from New Jersey. Compatible with multiple payment processors. Limited public information on specific leadership.

24 Capital is a Miami-based direct funder providing business loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, lines of credit, and revenue-based financing. Known for 24-hour funding speed, working with businesses regardless of credit history. Limited public information on specific leadership.

Co-founded 360 Payments in 2011 with Lisa Coyle in Silicon Valley. Ursinus College graduate (Biology, 2004-2008) where he played football. Worked at Heartland Payment Systems 2008-2011 as Division Manager, selling $100K+ revenue in 8 months. Company now processes $3B+ annually serving 5,000+ businesses in US and Canada. Opened second office in Tulsa in May 2025.

Co-CEO and co-founder of 360 Payments since 2011. Founded the company in her mid-twenties with Steve Ciabattoni, growing it into a Silicon Valley payment processing company with merchant cash advance capabilities. Opened second office in Tulsa, OK in May 2025.

news.h: 360 Payments Opens Second Office in Tulsa
news.d: Co-CEOs Lisa Coyle and Steve Ciabattoni expand operations with a new office in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

leaders.bg: Serial entrepreneur who co-founded 8fig in 2020. Previously worked at Mercury Interactive (acquired by HP for $4.5B) as developer and team manager (2004-2007). Co-founded mobile payment app Check, travel/culture outlet The Culture Trip, and payment security platform Qlarium (all successfully acquired). Bar-Ilan University graduate with BA in Economics and Computer Science (1996-1999). IAF 'Atuda' program alumnus. 8fig acquired by Bizcap/NewCo Capital Group in October 2025.

Co-founded 8fig in July 2020 and Qlarium in February 2018 (acquired by DeltaCapita 2020). Previously held multiple management positions at HP Software including Group Manager for HP Control Tower and Manager for Service Health. Bar-Ilan University CS degree (1999-2001). Also studied at Reichman University. Leads 8fig's AI CFO technology platform.

news.h: Bizcap Acquires 8fig for Global AI-Driven SME Funding
news.d: Bizcap and US affiliate NewCo Capital Group acquired 8fig, integrating AI-driven systems for automated underwriting and business funding.

news.h: 8fig Surpasses $500M in Funding Delivered to Online Sellers
news.d: Milestone achievement for the AI CFO platform enabling ecommerce sellers to plan, forecast, and scale.

leaders.bg: CRO of Advance Funds Network (AFN) managing a 60-person team. Started in college in 2016 and rose to leadership. Brooklyn-based. Previously held Sales Director position at AFN and worked at Massey Knakal Realty Services. AFN generates $14M annual revenue with offices in Brooklyn, New Jersey, Florida, Chicago, and Toronto.

Founded American Stimulus Funding Corp and established it as a prominent player in MCA funding, purchasing future credit card sales from small businesses since 2009. Has provided over $1B to 30,000+ businesses with 1-3 day funding. Based in Pompano Beach, FL. Company purchases future credit card sales at a discount with daily sales repayment.
President and co-owner of American Stimulus Funding Corp. Oversees operations of the family-run MCA business alongside founder Lawrence Principato.

Appointed CEO in 2011 after serving as CFO/COO since 2007. Scaled annual lending 12x from $5M to nearly $60M. Previously worked 3 years as CPA at Deloitte & Touche audit division, 7 years as investment banker at JPMorgan Chase, Citibank, and Barclays, and 4 years in Harlem/Upper Manhattan commercial revitalization. Columbia Business School MBA (Robert A. Toigo Fellow), University of Washington BA in Accounting/Business Administration. Organization has supported 57,000+ entrepreneurs with $420M in loans.

news.h: Ascendus Responds to Executive Order Limiting CDFI Fund
news.d: CEO Paul Quintero responded to Trump executive order that limits the future of the CDFI Fund, affirming the organization's mission to meet needs traditional lenders cannot.

news.h: Ascendus Partners on Family Child Care Capital Access Initiative
news.d: Partnership with LIIF and Working Solutions CDFI to provide loans and technical assistance to licensed in-home child care providers in California.

leaders.bg: Co-President of Enova Small Business division which includes The Business Backer, OnDeck, and Headway Capital brands. Joined Enova in 2018 from Lendio where he served as President and CRO (2014-2018). Previously COO at FDI Management and ZOA. Arizona State University BBA in Accounting and Finance (1994). Also leads Enova Decisions. Enova announced $369M Grasshopper Bank acquisition with new CEO Steve Cunningham effective Jan 2026.

news.h: Enova Announces $369M Grasshopper Bank Acquisition
news.d: Parent company Enova International to acquire Grasshopper Bank for $369M, gaining bank charter advantage. Expected to close H2 2026.

news.h: OnDeck Releases Small Business Cash Flow Trend Report
news.d: Small businesses anticipate strong growth while proactively planning for AI implementation and tariffs.
